tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: (3/3) “It is ascertained that 18,000 passports have been granted.” This letter from the consul general in Alexandria, Egypt…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: (3/3) “It is ascertained that 18,000 passports have been granted.” This letter from the consul general in Alexandria, Egypt in 1865 demonstrates the crucial role consular officials played during epidemics, such as assisting in evacuations. go.usa.gov/xvk37 #FRUS #FSIatHome
